The BRN-180 is a modern take on the classic AR-180 rifle design, featuring a short-stroke gas piston system for reliable operation, this rifle offers shooters a lightweight and compact platform, perfect for tactical applications or sport shooting. Retaining the familiar ergonomics of the AR-15 platform while offering enhanced reliability and ease of maintenance, the BRN-180 is known for its accuracy and smooth shooting experience, making it a popular choice among firearms enthusiasts looking for a versatile and reliable rifle.
